list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Added camera, but it's not smooth.

task.summary: Added abstraction level (Entity>creature>HeroAbstract) Game Loop Timer is fine Started State DesignPattern
Added some constants, updated HeroAbstract,Entity,Creature App is compiling and working
Added World class and whole Tile package, game is working
Added res/worlds and Utils class, game is working (Idea to change this system into XML-based system)
Added camera, but it's not smooth.
Added collision detection, and Handler class which connect World&Game
Added camera limits, everything is working
